meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting a material with pozzolanic properties.
meanings.sent1: The pozzolanic material enhanced the strength of the concrete.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the pozzolanic reaction in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The pozzolanic mix turned out to be the secret ingredient for the perfect mortar.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as pozzolanic as the volcanic ash used in the mixture.
meanings.sent5: The pozzolanic effect of the volcanic ash was evident in the sturdy walls of the ancient city.

meanings.definition: A substance with pozzolanic properties, typically used in construction.
meanings.sent1: The builders added pozzolanic to the cement for better durability.
meanings.sent2: The pozzolanic was stored in a secure container at the construction site.
meanings.sent3: The workers joked that the pozzolanic was the real superhero of the building project.
meanings.sent4: The pozzolanic acted like a magic potion, strengthening the structure overnight.
meanings.sent5: The ancient Romans used pozzolanic in their architectural marvels, standing strong to this day.
